channel.title: How do I make someone a mod?
channel.description: I tried changing character rights in the characters file, but when I log in to that account, the rights were still 0.

item.title: How do I make someone a mod?
item.dc:creator: @dassa dassa
item.description:
@dassa wrote:

gah[br][size=1]Posted on: May 16, 2007, 06:33:53 PM[/size][hr]Ahhh… I got this idea from heLLnut:
I ctrl+f 'd admin list and replaced everything there with:

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME HERE"))
            {
               playerRights = 3;
            }

It worked!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make someone a mod?
